document.full_text: drug companies helped drive an almost 18 percent increase in corporate philanthropy last year as they gave away medicine to poor americans still struggling in a rough economy, a survey found on thursday.
document.title: drug companies drive u.s. 2010 corporate philanthropy
lines_and_colors: drug companies helped drive an almost 18 percent increase in corporate philanthropy last year as they gave away medicine to poor americans still struggling in a rough economy, a survey found on thursday.
